content: this tutorial can be viewed for free at sweetbeecrochet com 1 learn how to crochet a simple hexagon using your favourite worsted weight yarn helpful photos with labeled stitches provide a clear visual of placement within each round also included in the tutorial are links to free patterns using a hexie motif and other ideas for use *materials needed * * small amount of worsted weight yarn cotton or acrylic * a hook to compliment your yarn choice 4mm-6mm would work best * yarn needle * scissors 1 https //sweetbeecrochet com/2020/03/26/crochet-hexagon-tutorial/
